comment.content: Please accept my most sincere condolences on the loss of your father-in-law.

post.content: I just heard that Scott's father-in-law passed away on Oct 1st around 1 am. 1) funeral home location : loaction 2) time : Oct 3rd (Sat), 11 am 3) Crimation service : Oct 3rd (sat), 1 pm.
post.title: Scott's father-in-law
